publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N. and I. Okes, and are to be sold by George Hutton at the signe of the Sun within Turning-stile in Holborne,

notesStmt.note: Preliminaries signed by the translator: R.B., i.e. Robert Basset.
Translation sometimes attributed to Richard Brathwait.
Translation of: Paoli, Gio Antonio di. Sommario delle vite de gl'imperadori romani.
With an additional title page, engraved: The exact collection of all the Roman emperors. .. by R.B. G.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
